Reviewing Folder History

The history of a folder shows when folder properties changed and who made the changes. In StarTeam, this history can easily be reviewed by clicking the History tab.

To view a folder’s history:

  1. Select a folder from the folder hierarchy.

  2. Select Properties from the Folder or context menu. The Folder Properties dialog opens.

  3. Click the History tab on the lower pane.

    4. The History list shows each change to the folder properties as a different branch revision. It lists the view name, the revision number, the author (person making the change), the time, and the branch revision. Although it includes a column for Comment, the person changing folder properties is not forced to enter any explanation.
